name: What a Load of Pollocks
description:
Our entry to the 8th Alakajam for the theme depth!

Instructions:

Once a fish is hooked hold spacebar to reel it in.
If the fish starts fighting you, release space or the tension gauge will rise. 

If the tension gauge reaches max the line will snap and its game over!

The tension gauge will also increase if you dont reel the fish in when you get the chance!
